thag1.10:5.1: A knowledge master, peaceful and restrained,
thag1.10:5.2: is rid of concern for this world and the world beyond.
thag1.10:5.3: Unsullied in the midst of all things,
thag1.10:5.4: they know the arising and passing of the world.
thag1.10:6.1: It was thus that this verse was recited by the senior venerable Puṇṇamāsa.
